entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ogoki
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:51 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -29.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ogoki Post Airport 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 23.
